content:
761 
 
    (vi) IBADAN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) Arts or Social 
Sciences subjects.  
(vii) CUAB and BAYERO accept two (2) 'O' level credit passes only 
in Social Sciences subjects.  
(viii) PHC requires 'O' level credit pa sses in Government, History 
or Geography.  
(ix) BENIN accepts ND upper credit/HND lower credit in relevant 
subjects. Direct Entry candidates must satisfy the UTME 
requirements.  
(x) AAUA requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics and one (1) Social Science subject 
plus any other subject
